cn.trackName: 无尽坦克大战 - 八位元单机王者 完美模拟穿越旧经典电视手游
cn.description:
经典到不能再经典的小霸王红白机坦克, 小时候发梦也在玩. 在2012年我们为了延续儿时回忆, 开发了超级坦克大战, 很多人到现在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因为我们提供了500张地图. 天天玩, 玩了多年也还未玩完.

由于游戏引擎老化问题, 我们很难在超级坦克大战的基础上加入新功能. 所以我们决定开发新的坦克大战, "无尽坦克大战", 延续经典回忆.

作为经典的延续无尽坦克大战, 包含了所有经典元素, 改良了的新特点.
保证你可以玩到下一个十年.

游戏重点:
- 防御你的基地
- 摧毁所有敌方坦克
- 加入超级坦克大战500张传奇地图

无尽坦克大战, 是个跨平台游戏, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的踪影.
游戏会不定期更新, 目标是1000张地图.

cn.trackName: 聖經(和合本)(繁體中英對照)
cn.releaseNotes:
This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

支持新版本iOS. 可下載其他語言聖經(通過設置菜單可直接顯示或隱藏不同版本聖經)。用拼音加註選中中文並可讀出。
cn.description:
聖經(和合本)(繁體中英對照)
	Application contains traditional Chinese bible and English bible for reference reading.
	可自由選擇中英對照, 繁體中文或英文聖經閱讀.


請參考在PalReader 網站上的使用錄像來深入了解此應用程序.
閱讀程序具有以下先進功能:

專為iPhone 而做的存儲優化, 存儲相同的圖書比其它程序節省超過30%的空間.
全屏幕閱讀支持. LoudReader 只在用戶需要時顯示控制對話框, 而其它iPhone 閱讀程序顯示控制始終佔用寶貴的屏幕.
支持任意方向閱讀. 程序自動調整圖書顯示方式.
使用HTML顯示圖書的多種字體與圖像, 優於其它程序的單一字體文本顯示方式.
頁內捲動控制幫助讀者在長頁面內快速移動到任意位置.
直觀調整字體大小,顏色以及背景.
手指雙擊擊即可使用的章節選擇, 字體大小控制.
歷史記憶功能幫助用戶快速到任意章節或前後章節
準確回到上次閱讀位置(甚至包括上次卷滾條位置)

操作簡介

每一章為一長頁, 用手指拖動卷滾或輕擊頁面上部1/4或下部1/4進行向上或向下翻頁.
雙擊頁面即可彈出控制面板. 閱讀器的操作由這一個彈出式控制面板控制, 簡單直觀方便易用.
如希望快速在頁面內移動, 可用控制面板小滾輪選擇頁面位置百分比.
輕擊綠色的箭頭控制章節導航的後退和前進.
退出閱讀器時程序會自動記住最後的閱讀位置(甚至包括上次卷滾條位置), 下次進入閱讀器時程序直接打開到此處.

cn.description:
Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager

Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly.

With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app.

Notepad++ also includes a Today’s Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders.

In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place.

Key Features:-
- Notes & Organization
     • Unlimited notes storage
     • Multiple note colors
     • Pinned & private notes
     • Custom font styles & font sizes
     • Sort notes by name or date
     • Auto-delete notes after a selected time
     • Easy note sharing
     • One-tap quick note creation

- Security
     • App lock with multiple passcode options
     • Touch ID & Face ID support

- iCloud Sync
     • iCloud sync for notes
     • Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud

- Widgets & Notifications
     • Widget for today’s notes
     • Notifications for daily notes & reminders

- PDF Editor & Manager
     • Create and manage PDF files
     • Edit existing PDFs
     • Export notes as PDF
     • Share PDFs easily
     • Add signatures and stamps to PDFs
     • Store and organize PDFs in one place

Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications.

Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected.

Thank you for using this app. We’re committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

cn.trackCensoredName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
cn.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
cn.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

cn.description:
专为便携式墨水屏玩家打造的神器，让您的设备更好用、更顺手。 本应用能够在手机上直接将 .ttf 字体和电子书，转换为便携墨水屏专用的 .bin 字体、XTC 或 EPUB 格式。

【核心功能】
• 所见即所得的字体定制 支持导入外部 .ttf 字体或使用系统字体。包含行间距、字间距、大小、粗细等全方位参数调整。实时模拟各类墨水屏设备的显示效果，调整满意再导出。
• 强大的电子书工具箱 支持导入多种格式电子书，在手机上预览排版效果。自由调整布局后，一键转换并导出为标准格式。
• 深度设备联动 支持与多款设备无线连接，一键推送字体或管理文件。目前支持设备：阅星曈X4、EDCBook、墨菲3.7、武哒哒·小墨等。
• 纯粹的安全与隐私 承诺纯离线运行，所有转换任务均在手机本地完成，绝不上传任何用户数据。（注：网络与定位权限仅用于连接您的墨水屏设备）

【关于开发者】
这是一款由个人开发者通过 AI 辅助（Vibe Coding）完成的作品。由于设备精力有限，无法覆盖所有测试场景，如果您发现了奇奇怪怪的 Bug，请多多包涵。
非常感谢各位“云股东”的支持与厚爱，欢迎随时在评论区交流建议或吐槽！

使用条款 (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

hk.description:
Inspect papers, prevent smuggling—keep the border safe or profit from corruption.

Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.

NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer.

Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience.

Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully.

Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband.

Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty.

Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband.

Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security?

Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

hk.description:
歡迎來到 Inkblade Idlers，一款將水墨畫的寧靜意境，與武俠世界的熱血豪情完美結合的掛機角色扮演遊戲。

輕鬆暢玩，策略深度並存
你的俠客將自動修煉與戰鬥，即使離線也能持續獲得銀兩與經驗。回到遊戲後，投入資源強化武功、裝備神兵利器與研習稀有秘籍，穩步推進你的江湖實力。

挑戰武林霸主，蒐集失傳絕學
迎戰威震四方的武林強者，展開一場場巔峰對決。每一次勝利，都能解鎖失傳的武功秘籍，讓俠客習得獨門絕技，自由打造專屬於你的戰鬥流派。

經營你的武俠世界
升級商鋪以提升收入，擴充背包收納更多珍稀裝備，並策略性配置你的隊伍。每一個決定，都是邁向一代宗師的重要一步。

遊戲特色
- 絕美水墨風格，打造充滿生命力的武俠世界
- 真正的掛機玩法，二十四小時持續成長
- 海量收集內容，包含武器、防具與稀有武功秘籍
- 策略經營系統，平衡資源、收益與戰力成長
- 多樣強力頭目戰，考驗俠客陣容的極限實力

立即下載 Inkblade Idlers，展開一段悠然卻強大的武俠旅程，無需重複練功，也能成就一代傳奇。

hk.description:
SmallFish is a project based on the Stockfish chess engine. It uses the latest Stockfish chess engine (Stockfish 17.1), rated about Elo 3600+ and is the strongest chess app on the App Store.

SmallFish offers you three distinct ways to improve your game. You can review your game with comments, or study how Stockfish thinks, or track your progress. No in-app purchase, no ads, no data tracking.

SmallFish is simply amazing. It's small but powerful, you'll be surprised.

Features
---------

- Blunder checking
- Multiple line analysis
- Graphical evaluation of your game
- Game previews
- Dark mode support
- Endgame tablebase
- Opening books

Why not just download and try it yourself?

hk.description:
專為電子紙（E-Ink）玩家打造的神器，讓您的設備更好用、更順手。
本應用程式能夠在手機上直接將 .ttf 字型和電子書，轉換為攜帶型電子紙設備專用的 .bin 字型、XTC 或 EPUB 格式。

【核心功能】
• 所見即所得的字型客製化
支援導入外部 .ttf 字型或使用系統字型。包含行距、字距、大小、粗細等全方位參數調整。即時模擬各類電子紙設備的顯示效果，調整滿意再導出。
• 強大的電子書工具箱
支援導入多種格式電子書，在手機上預覽排版效果。自由調整佈局後，一鍵轉換並導出為標準格式。
• 深度設備連動
支援與多款設備無線連接，一鍵推送字型或管理檔案。目前支援設備：閱星曈 X4、EDCBook、墨菲 3.7、武噠噠·小墨等。
• 純粹的安全與隱私
承諾純離線運行，所有轉換任務均在手機本機完成，絕不上傳任何用戶資料。（註：網路與定位權限僅用於連接您的電子紙設備）

【關於開發者】
這是一款由個人開發者透過 AI 輔助（Vibe Coding）完成的作品。由於設備精力有限，無法覆蓋所有測試場景，如果您發現了奇怪的 Bug，請多多包涵。
非常感謝各位「雲端股東」的支援與厚愛，歡迎隨時在評論區交流建議或吐槽！

使用條款 (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

hk.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

mo.description:
Northgard is a strategy game based on Norse mythology in which you control a Clan of Vikings fighting for the control of a mysterious newfound continent.

After years of tireless explorations, brave Vikings have discovered a new land filled with mystery, danger and riches: NORTHGARD.

The boldest Northmen have set sail to explore and conquer these new shores, bring fame to their Clan and write history through conquest, trading, or devotion to the Gods.

That is, if they can survive the dire Wolves and Undead Warriors roaming the land, befriend or defeat the giants, and survive the harshest winters ever witnessed in the North.

FEATURES
• Build your settlement on the newly discovered continent of Northgard
• Assign your vikings to various jobs (Farmer, Warrior, Sailor, Loremaster...)
• Manage your resources carefully and survive harsh winters and vicious foes
• Expand and discover new territory with unique strategic opportunities
• Achieve different victory conditions (Conquest, Fame, Lore, Trading...)

STORY MODE: RIG’S SAGA
The Viking High King is murdered and his Regal Horn is stolen by a man named Hagen.
This event kickstarts a saga that will take Rig, his son and heir accompanied by his right-hand man Brand through the new continent of Northgard.
The continent where he will make new friends and foes and discover a much greater threat than Hagen, and the reasons behind his father’s assassination.

MULTIPLAYER
• Play with or against other Mobile players with up to 6 players
• Includes Duel, Free for All and Teamplay modes

CHOOSE YOUR CLAN
In order to complete the 11 campaign chapters, the player will have to master the specificities of the 6 first clans and tame the unforgiving wilderness of Northgard.

More clans are joining the fight for Northgard!
• Clan of the Snake: Act from the shadows and take the lead with cunning guerilla tactics
• Clan of the Dragon: Embrace the old ways and please the gods with sacrifices
• Clan of the Kraken: Harness the bounty of the sea and unleash its brutal might
You can unlock the clans of the Snake, Dragon and Kraken separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Scale Bundle.

• Clan of the Horse: Devote yourself to the art of blacksmithing and craft powerful Relics
• Clan of the Ox: Equip ancestral equipment and prove the might of your forefathers
• Clan of the Lynx: Adopt Nature’s way and lure mythical preys into ambushes
You can unlock the Clans of the Horse, Ox and Lynx separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Fur Bundle.

• Clan of the Squirrel: Gather ingredients to prepare special recipes and survive the harsh winters
• Clan of the Rat: Embrace the way of the Shamans and work for the clan
• Clan of the Eagle: Occupy a large territory, venture outside and gather resources
Unlock the clans of the Squirrel, Rat and Eagle separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Winter Bundle.


Carefully redesigned for mobile
• Revamped interface
• Game Center achievements
• iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices

If you experience any issue with Northgard, please contact our customer support at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

A lightweight safety tool crafted for solo dwellers, establishing invisible safety protection through check-in monitoring and emergency contact mechanisms to make solitary life more reassuring

· Automatic Notification for Unchecked-In Days ·
Set up one emergency contact (family member or friend) in advance. If you haven’t checked in via the app for consecutive days, the system will automatically send an email to them the next day to promptly convey safety anomalies and gain critical intervention time for potential risks

· Effortless Setup & Use ·
No registration or login required. Simply enter the contact’s name and email to complete setup on first use. Tap to check in daily, with the background automatically monitoring your status without disturbing daily routines to ensure easy and convenient operation

· Strict Privacy Protection ·
Uses encryption technology to safeguard emergency contact information and check-in records. Refuses to collect irrelevant permissions like location, eliminating privacy leakage risks and ensuring personal information security for trustworthy safety guardianship

· For All Solo Dwellers ·
Whether you’re a solo office worker, a student living away from home, or anyone choosing a solitary lifestyle, Demumu serves as your safety companion: daily check-ins signal safety, while abnormal situations trigger early notifications to give those who care about you peace of mind and add a layer of protection for yourself

Alone but not lonely, safety by your side. Protect every solitary moment with simple solutions and build a solid safety line for solo living

User Agreement: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/UserAgreement.html
Privacy Policy: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/PrivacyPolicy.html
Official Email: Demumuofficial@nexun.vip

Demumu Team

mo.description:
You wake up in an unknown place and the last thing you remember is being kidnapped. But something has happened in that strange place, something out of the ordinary ... something dangerous. You must discover the way to escape. Because here, you will only find death.

-Explore a large dark area: secret buildings, a creepy hospital and mysterious laboratories. 

-Solve puzzles and search, collect and use objects to escape from the place.

-Escape with your friends in online multiplayer mode! (Alpha)


INCLUDES:

-New map: Forest
-Create unlimited private multiplayer rooms
-No ads

經典到不能再經典的紅白機坦克, 小時候發夢也在玩. 在2012年我們為了延續兒時回憶, 開發了超級坦克大戰, 很多人到現在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因為我們提供了500張地圖. 天天玩, 玩了多年也還未玩完.

由於遊戲引擎老化問題, 我們很難在超級坦克大戰的基礎上加入新功能. 所以我們決定開發新的坦克大戰, "無盡坦克大戰", 延續經典回憶. 

作為經典的延續無盡坦克大戰, 包含了所有經典元素, 改良了的新特點.
保證你可以玩到下一個十年.

遊戲重點:
- 防禦你的基地
- 摧毀所有敵方坦克
- 加入超級坦克大戰500張傳奇地圖

無盡坦克大戰, 是個跨平台遊戲, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的蹤影.
遊戲會不定期更新, 目標是1000張地圖.

mo.description:
Inspect papers, prevent smuggling—keep the border safe or profit from corruption.

Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.

NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer.

Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience.

Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully.

Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband.

Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty.

Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband.

Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security?

Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

mo.description:
歡迎來到 Inkblade Idlers，一款將水墨畫的寧靜意境，與武俠世界的熱血豪情完美結合的掛機角色扮演遊戲。

輕鬆暢玩，策略深度並存
你的俠客將自動修煉與戰鬥，即使離線也能持續獲得銀兩與經驗。回到遊戲後，投入資源強化武功、裝備神兵利器與研習稀有秘籍，穩步推進你的江湖實力。

挑戰武林霸主，蒐集失傳絕學
迎戰威震四方的武林強者，展開一場場巔峰對決。每一次勝利，都能解鎖失傳的武功秘籍，讓俠客習得獨門絕技，自由打造專屬於你的戰鬥流派。

經營你的武俠世界
升級商鋪以提升收入，擴充背包收納更多珍稀裝備，並策略性配置你的隊伍。每一個決定，都是邁向一代宗師的重要一步。

遊戲特色
- 絕美水墨風格，打造充滿生命力的武俠世界
- 真正的掛機玩法，二十四小時持續成長
- 海量收集內容，包含武器、防具與稀有武功秘籍
- 策略經營系統，平衡資源、收益與戰力成長
- 多樣強力頭目戰，考驗俠客陣容的極限實力

立即下載 Inkblade Idlers，展開一段悠然卻強大的武俠旅程，無需重複練功，也能成就一代傳奇。

SmallFish is a project based on the Stockfish chess engine. It uses the latest Stockfish chess engine (Stockfish 17.1), rated about Elo 3600+ and is the strongest chess app on the App Store.

SmallFish offers you three distinct ways to improve your game. You can review your game with comments, or study how Stockfish thinks, or track your progress. No in-app purchase, no ads, no data tracking.

SmallFish is simply amazing. It's small but powerful, you'll be surprised.

Features
---------

- Blunder checking
- Multiple line analysis
- Graphical evaluation of your game
- Game previews
- Dark mode support
- Endgame tablebase
- Opening books

Why not just download and try it yourself?

New Performance Update!

We’ve made improvements following the major update to ensure everything runs smoothly.

• Minor bug fixes for a smoother and more stable experience
• Faster, high-quality PDF export support
• Improved overall user experience

As we step into the new year, we’re committed to delivering more reliable, faster, and feature-rich updates with an even smoother experience.

Wishing you a productive and successful New Year!
We’d love your feedback — share your thoughts and suggestions at shaktiwebtech@outlook.com.
mo.description:
Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager

Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly.

With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app.

Notepad++ also includes a Today’s Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders.

In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place.

Key Features:-
- Notes & Organization
     • Unlimited notes storage
     • Multiple note colors
     • Pinned & private notes
     • Custom font styles & font sizes
     • Sort notes by name or date
     • Auto-delete notes after a selected time
     • Easy note sharing
     • One-tap quick note creation

- Security
     • App lock with multiple passcode options
     • Touch ID & Face ID support

- iCloud Sync
     • iCloud sync for notes
     • Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud

- Widgets & Notifications
     • Widget for today’s notes
     • Notifications for daily notes & reminders

- PDF Editor & Manager
     • Create and manage PDF files
     • Edit existing PDFs
     • Export notes as PDF
     • Share PDFs easily
     • Add signatures and stamps to PDFs
     • Store and organize PDFs in one place

Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications.

Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected.

Thank you for using this app. We’re committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

由於遊戲引擎老化問題, 我們很難在超級坦克大戰的基礎上加入新功能. 所以我們決定開發新的坦克大戰, "無盡坦克大戰", 延續經典回憶. 

作為經典的延續無盡坦克大戰, 包含了所有經典元素, 改良了的新特點.
保證你可以玩到下一個十年.

遊戲重點:
- 防禦你的基地
- 摧毀所有敵方坦克
- 加入超級坦克大戰500張傳奇地圖

無盡坦克大戰, 是個跨平台遊戲, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的蹤影.
遊戲會不定期更新, 目標是1000張地圖.

tw.description:
Inspect papers, prevent smuggling—keep the border safe or profit from corruption.

Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.

NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer.

Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience.

Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully.

Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband.

Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty.

Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband.

Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security?

Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

tw.description:
Motorsport Manager Mobile 3 is the ultimate race team strategy game. 

Build up your very own motorsport team from scratch, making every big decision. Hire the drivers, assemble the team, develop your car and mastermind your way to glory.

• This is your racing team. Hire drivers, develop your car and invest in technology.
• Work with your drivers to achieve the perfect qualifying lap.
• Formulate the ideal pitstop strategy to win races.
• Watch the race in real-time or jump into the strategy screens to take control of the action.
• React to weather changes, crashes and safety car periods.
• Win championships across the world to reach the pinnacle of motorsport.

New in MM Mobile 3
=====================
GT AND ENDURANCE RACING
With 6 new championships, MM Mobile 3 is bigger and better than ever before. GT races bring action-packed, wheel-to-wheel action, while Endurance is a Motorsport Manager’s ultimate strategic challenge, with 3 drivers per car and timed races!

A STUNNING SETTING
Monaco makes its Motorsport Manager debut! Manage your cars around la Rascasse, Casino Square and the Swimming Pool. It’s the ultimate test, rendered in a beautiful, detailed new art style.

AUGMENTED REALITY
AR support brings you the ultimate camera mode! Choose your own perspective on the race. Peer over trees, through bridges and down cliffsides as you experience races in a whole new way.

NEW FEATURES
The Supplier Network sees managers grow their team’s presence around the globe, while Invitational Races are huge annual events, bringing international races with a unique twist. Mechanics are the new members of your team, and their relationship with the driver is all-important!

GAME CHANGERS
Votes on rule changes, dynamic AI team movement (including teams going bust and being replaced) and new difficulty settings mean that the world of motorsport constantly evolves – but the challenge stays at your level.

ON-TRACK ACTION
Energy Recovery System, with Hybrid and Power modes, mixes up every race! Will you boost your way past your rivals into clear air, or smartly manage your fuel levels to pull off a genius strategy?

tw.description:
歡迎來到 Inkblade Idlers，一款將水墨畫的寧靜意境，與武俠世界的熱血豪情完美結合的掛機角色扮演遊戲。

輕鬆暢玩，策略深度並存
你的俠客將自動修煉與戰鬥，即使離線也能持續獲得銀兩與經驗。回到遊戲後，投入資源強化武功、裝備神兵利器與研習稀有秘籍，穩步推進你的江湖實力。

挑戰武林霸主，蒐集失傳絕學
迎戰威震四方的武林強者，展開一場場巔峰對決。每一次勝利，都能解鎖失傳的武功秘籍，讓俠客習得獨門絕技，自由打造專屬於你的戰鬥流派。

經營你的武俠世界
升級商鋪以提升收入，擴充背包收納更多珍稀裝備，並策略性配置你的隊伍。每一個決定，都是邁向一代宗師的重要一步。

遊戲特色
- 絕美水墨風格，打造充滿生命力的武俠世界
- 真正的掛機玩法，二十四小時持續成長
- 海量收集內容，包含武器、防具與稀有武功秘籍
- 策略經營系統，平衡資源、收益與戰力成長
- 多樣強力頭目戰，考驗俠客陣容的極限實力

立即下載 Inkblade Idlers，展開一段悠然卻強大的武俠旅程，無需重複練功，也能成就一代傳奇。

tw.description:
Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager

Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly.

With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app.

Notepad++ also includes a Today’s Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders.

In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place.

Key Features:-
- Notes & Organization
     • Unlimited notes storage
     • Multiple note colors
     • Pinned & private notes
     • Custom font styles & font sizes
     • Sort notes by name or date
     • Auto-delete notes after a selected time
     • Easy note sharing
     • One-tap quick note creation

- Security
     • App lock with multiple passcode options
     • Touch ID & Face ID support

- iCloud Sync
     • iCloud sync for notes
     • Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud

- Widgets & Notifications
     • Widget for today’s notes
     • Notifications for daily notes & reminders

- PDF Editor & Manager
     • Create and manage PDF files
     • Edit existing PDFs
     • Export notes as PDF
     • Share PDFs easily
     • Add signatures and stamps to PDFs
     • Store and organize PDFs in one place

Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications.

Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected.

Thank you for using this app. We’re committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

tw.description:
專為電子紙（E-Ink）玩家打造的神器，讓您的設備更好用、更順手。
本應用程式能夠在手機上直接將 .ttf 字型和電子書，轉換為攜帶型電子紙設備專用的 .bin 字型、XTC 或 EPUB 格式。

【核心功能】
• 所見即所得的字型客製化
支援導入外部 .ttf 字型或使用系統字型。包含行距、字距、大小、粗細等全方位參數調整。即時模擬各類電子紙設備的顯示效果，調整滿意再導出。
• 強大的電子書工具箱
支援導入多種格式電子書，在手機上預覽排版效果。自由調整佈局後，一鍵轉換並導出為標準格式。
• 深度設備連動
支援與多款設備無線連接，一鍵推送字型或管理檔案。目前支援設備：閱星曈 X4、EDCBook、墨菲 3.7、武噠噠·小墨等。
• 純粹的安全與隱私
承諾純離線運行，所有轉換任務均在手機本機完成，絕不上傳任何用戶資料。（註：網路與定位權限僅用於連接您的電子紙設備）

【關於開發者】
這是一款由個人開發者透過 AI 輔助（Vibe Coding）完成的作品。由於設備精力有限，無法覆蓋所有測試場景，如果您發現了奇怪的 Bug，請多多包涵。
非常感謝各位「雲端股東」的支援與厚愛，歡迎隨時在評論區交流建議或吐槽！

使用條款 (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

us.description:
A lightweight safety tool crafted for solo dwellers, establishing invisible safety protection through check-in monitoring and emergency contact mechanisms to make solitary life more reassuring

· Automatic Notification for Unchecked-In Days ·
Set up one emergency contact (family member or friend) in advance. If you haven’t checked in via the app for consecutive days, the system will automatically send an email to them the next day to promptly convey safety anomalies and gain critical intervention time for potential risks

· Effortless Setup & Use ·
No registration or login required. Simply enter the contact’s name and email to complete setup on first use. Tap to check in daily, with the background automatically monitoring your status without disturbing daily routines to ensure easy and convenient operation

· Strict Privacy Protection ·
Uses encryption technology to safeguard emergency contact information and check-in records. Refuses to collect irrelevant permissions like location, eliminating privacy leakage risks and ensuring personal information security for trustworthy safety guardianship

· For All Solo Dwellers ·
Whether you’re a solo office worker, a student living away from home, or anyone choosing a solitary lifestyle, Demumu serves as your safety companion: daily check-ins signal safety, while abnormal situations trigger early notifications to give those who care about you peace of mind and add a layer of protection for yourself

Alone but not lonely, safety by your side. Protect every solitary moment with simple solutions and build a solid safety line for solo living

User Agreement: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/UserAgreement.html
Privacy Policy: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/PrivacyPolicy.html
Official Email: Demumuofficial@nexun.vip

Demumu Team

us.description:
This app plus your ears equals complete freedom in writing music!

A comprehensive set of tools for any musician:

* Chord Progression: Create beautiful chord progressions with full flexibility - use inversions, sus2, sus4, 7th, 9th, and more. Enjoy live playback as piano or synth, or send MIDI directly to your macOS computer!
* MIDI Keyboard: Transform your phone into a MIDI keyboard for your macOS computer (compatible with macOS Catalina and newer).
* Notation Practice: Practice reading notes in both treble and bass clefs.
* Chord Calculation: Help you learn how to calculate chords and progressions.
* Interval Practice: Practice recognizing and comparing musical intervals by ear.
* Voice & Ear Training: Simple, effective tools for voice practice and ear training.
* Harmonic Match - helps you mix tracks in key while DJing.

Plus, enjoy the macOS version included with your purchase!

us.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

us.description:
Designed for e-ink enthusiasts, making your portable readers more powerful and easier to use.
Seamlessly convert .ttf fonts and e-books on your phone into .bin fonts, XTC, or EPUB formats perfectly tuned for portable e-ink screens.

[CORE FEATURES]
• WYSIWYG Font Customization
Import external .ttf fonts or use system fonts. Adjust line spacing, tracking, size, weight, and more with precision. Real-time simulation of various e-ink screens—preview exactly how it looks before exporting.
• Powerful E-book Toolbox
Import various e-book formats to preview layouts directly on your phone. Customize formatting and convert to standard formats with a single tap.
• Seamless Device Integration
Wireless connection to supported devices for font pushing and file management. Supported Devices: XTEInk X4, EDCBook, Murphy 3.7, Wudada·Little Ink, and more.
• Privacy First & Offline
100% Offline: All processing is done locally on your device. No user data is ever uploaded. (Note: Network and Location permissions are required solely for connecting to your e-ink hardware.)

[NOTE FROM DEVELOPER]
This app is an indie project built with "AI Vibe Coding." While I strive for perfection, I cannot test every scenario. If you encounter any bugs, I appreciate your understanding.
Thank you to all the "Community Supporters" for your feedback! Feel free to leave suggestions or comments.

Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

tr.description:
A lightweight safety tool crafted for solo dwellers, establishing invisible safety protection through check-in monitoring and emergency contact mechanisms to make solitary life more reassuring

· Automatic Notification for Unchecked-In Days ·
Set up one emergency contact (family member or friend) in advance. If you haven’t checked in via the app for consecutive days, the system will automatically send an email to them the next day to promptly convey safety anomalies and gain critical intervention time for potential risks

· Effortless Setup & Use ·
No registration or login required. Simply enter the contact’s name and email to complete setup on first use. Tap to check in daily, with the background automatically monitoring your status without disturbing daily routines to ensure easy and convenient operation

· Strict Privacy Protection ·
Uses encryption technology to safeguard emergency contact information and check-in records. Refuses to collect irrelevant permissions like location, eliminating privacy leakage risks and ensuring personal information security for trustworthy safety guardianship

· For All Solo Dwellers ·
Whether you’re a solo office worker, a student living away from home, or anyone choosing a solitary lifestyle, Demumu serves as your safety companion: daily check-ins signal safety, while abnormal situations trigger early notifications to give those who care about you peace of mind and add a layer of protection for yourself

Alone but not lonely, safety by your side. Protect every solitary moment with simple solutions and build a solid safety line for solo living

User Agreement: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/UserAgreement.html
Privacy Policy: https://Moonscape.cc/Demumu/PrivacyPolicy.html
Official Email: Demumuofficial@nexun.vip

Demumu Team

Tank Battle is very popular TV game since 8-bit console present. From 2012, we develop "Super Tank Battle" and provide 500 maps to player. Many people play it day by day.

Now we using a new game engine to offer new game "Infinity Tank Battle".

Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements.

Core Game Rule:
- Defence your base
- Destroy all enemy tanks

Key Features:
- Different type of enemy
- Different type of Map style
- Special items
- Auto Helper tank
- Import Super Tank Battle 500 Legend maps

Infinity Tank Battle will continue update, our target is over 1000 map. And this game is cross-platform, you can find it on mobile, PC, and Mac.

tr.description:
Inspect papers, prevent smuggling—keep the border safe or profit from corruption.

Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game.

Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants.

Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy.

Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets.

Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country.

NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2:

Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer.

Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience.

Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully.

Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband.

Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty.

Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband.

Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security?

Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

Your heroes train and battle automatically, earning silver and experience even when you are offline. Return to spend resources on powerful skills, legendary weapons, and rare manuals to push your team further.

Conquer Mighty Bosses, Collect Secret Manuals
Face towering martial arts masters in epic showdowns. Each victory unlocks ancient secret manuals that teach your heroes unique and devastating abilities to customize your combat style.

Manage Your Martial World
Upgrade your shop to increase income, expand your backpack to hold more treasures, and strategically equip your team. Every decision strengthens your path to becoming the ultimate martial arts legend.

Key Features:
- Breathtaking ink-wash art inspired by traditional Chinese painting
- True idle gameplay with progress happening 24/7
- Collect and customize hundreds of weapons, armor, and martial arts manuals
- Strategic management of shops, resources, and inventory
- Challenging boss fights against powerful martial arts masters

Download Inkblade Idlers now and begin your tranquil yet powerful journey to martial arts supremacy. No grinding required.

tr.description:
Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager

Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly.

With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app.

Notepad++ also includes a Today’s Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders.

In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place.

Key Features:-
- Notes & Organization
     • Unlimited notes storage
     • Multiple note colors
     • Pinned & private notes
     • Custom font styles & font sizes
     • Sort notes by name or date
     • Auto-delete notes after a selected time
     • Easy note sharing
     • One-tap quick note creation

- Security
     • App lock with multiple passcode options
     • Touch ID & Face ID support

- iCloud Sync
     • iCloud sync for notes
     • Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud

- Widgets & Notifications
     • Widget for today’s notes
     • Notifications for daily notes & reminders

- PDF Editor & Manager
     • Create and manage PDF files
     • Edit existing PDFs
     • Export notes as PDF
     • Share PDFs easily
     • Add signatures and stamps to PDFs
     • Store and organize PDFs in one place

Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications.

Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected.

Thank you for using this app. We’re committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

tr.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

pt.description:
Já imaginou como é estar na linha da frente da segurança nacional?

Em Black Border 2, você assume o papel de um agente da Polícia de Fronteira, enfrentando situações desafiantes a cada turno. Com visuais detalhados e jogabilidade envolvente, este jogo oferece uma experiência realista incomparável que coloca você no centro da ação.

Assuma a responsabilidade de proteger as fronteiras do seu país contra o contrabando ilegal. Inspecione veículos, reveja documentos e enfrente contrabandistas que tentam traficar drogas, armas e outras mercadorias ilegais.

Cada dia traz novos desafios, onde pensamento rápido e visão aguçada são as suas melhores ferramentas. Você é mais do que um simples agente de fronteira — você é a última linha de defesa.

Funcionalidades de Black Border 2:

    Simulação autêntica de patrulha de fronteira: Coloque-se no papel de um verdadeiro agente, onde cada decisão conta e cada interação está carregada de tensão.

    Inspeção detalhada de documentos: Analise cuidadosamente passaportes, autorizações e outros documentos para decidir quem pode entrar e quem deve ser barrado.

    Deteção de contrabando: Realize buscas minuciosas em veículos e inspeções pessoais para capturar criminosos que tentam contrabandear mercadorias ilegais.

    Personagens dinâmicos com IA: Interaja com personagens realistas que reagem e se adaptam com base nas suas decisões e ações.

    Desafios crescentes: Desde pequenos erros em documentos até grandes redes de contrabando, enfrente missões cada vez mais intensas que vão testar os seus limites.

pt.description:
O Genius Scan é um scanner de bolso. Digitalize rapidamente seus documentos em qualquer lugar e exporte-os como arquivos JPEG ou PDF de várias páginas.

*** Apple App of the Week *** mais de 20 milhões de usuários *** milhares de pequenas empresas ***

Posicione qualquer documento em frente à câmera do seu dispositivo: nosso aplicativo digitalizador reconhecerá o papel contra o fundo, cortará sua imagem e limpará o resultado. Você obterá uma digitalização nítida e legível. A digitalização em lote permite que você digitalize dezenas de páginas em apenas alguns segundos. Ferramentas poderosas ajudam a organizar, compartilhar ou arquivar seus documentos.

"Na próxima vez que você planejar viajar, não se esqueça de baixar uma cópia do Genius Scan para facilitar sua vida e a do departamento de contabilidade." - AppPicker.com

"Os aplicativos de câmera não foram projetados para digitalizar textos de perto, mas o Genius Scan sim." - The Guardian

== ENTERPRISE EDITION ==

Pacote Genius Scan+ Premium:

- Todos os recursos premium do Genius Scan+ (indicados com + abaixo), prontos para usar (sem necessidade de atualização).

Configuração gerenciada:

- Implantação em frotas de dispositivos por uma ferramenta MDM
- Definição prévia das configurações do aplicativo por usuário (por exemplo, definir endereço de email padrão, credenciais de WebDAV/FTP)
- Controle de quais aplicativos e serviços para os quais os usuários podem exportar documentos
- Sem anúncios

== PRINCIPAIS RECURSOS == 

Digitalização inteligente:

- Detecção de documento e remoção de fundo
- Correção de distorções
- Remoção de sombras e limpeza de imperfeição
- Filtros (preto e branco, quadro branco, foto)
- Digitalização em lote

Criação e edição de PDF:

- Mescla e divisão de documentos
- Criação de PDF multipáginas
- Importação de fotos e PDF

Segurança e privacidade:

- Processamento de documentos no dispositivo
+ Face ID
+ Criptografia de senha no PDF

Organização de documentos:

- Identificação de documentos
- Pesquisa de metadados e conteúdo
+ Esquemas personalizados de nomenclatura (Smart Document Names)
+ Backup e sincronização multidispositivos da Genius Cloud (assinatura em separado)

Exporta:

- Email
+ Box, Dropbox, Evernote, Expensify, Google Drive, iCloud Drive, OneDrive, OneNote, FTP, SugarSync, WebDAV.
+ Qualquer serviço compatível com WebDAV, como Citrix ShareFile, NextCloud, ownCloud, Synology, Yandex. 
+ Exportação automática de fundo

OCR (Reconhecimento de texto):

+ Extração de texto
+ Criação de PDFs pesquisáveis
+ Leitura de cartões de visita e criação de contatos

== QUEM SOMOS ==

É no coração de Paris, na França, que The Grizzly Labs desenvolve o Genius Scan. Nos orgulhamos por criarmos aplicativos que ajudam milhões de usuários em todo o mundo, e que nos colocam nos mais altos padrões de qualidade e privacidade. Entre em contato conosco @thegrizzlylabs se tiver alguma dúvida.

== PREÇOS E LEGAIS ==

Você pode se inscrever no Genius Cloud para backup e sincronização. Nesse caso, a loja da Genius Scan exibe a duração e o preço de cada assinatura, atualizados no momento da compra. O pagamento será cobrado na conta do iTunes quando o pedido for confirmado. As assinaturas são renovadas automaticamente, a menos que a renovação automática seja desativada até 24 horas antes do final do período atual. Gerenciar assinaturas, desative a renovação automática nas configurações da conta do iTunes.

https://www.thegrizzlylabs.com/genius-scan/cloud/terms

pt.description:
专为便携式墨水屏玩家打造的神器，让您的设备更好用、更顺手。 本应用能够在手机上直接将 .ttf 字体和电子书，转换为便携墨水屏专用的 .bin 字体、XTC 或 EPUB 格式。

【核心功能】
• 所见即所得的字体定制 支持导入外部 .ttf 字体或使用系统字体。包含行间距、字间距、大小、粗细等全方位参数调整。实时模拟各类墨水屏设备的显示效果，调整满意再导出。
• 强大的电子书工具箱 支持导入多种格式电子书，在手机上预览排版效果。自由调整布局后，一键转换并导出为标准格式。
• 深度设备联动 支持与多款设备无线连接，一键推送字体或管理文件。目前支持设备：阅星曈X4、EDCBook、墨菲3.7、武哒哒·小墨等。
• 纯粹的安全与隐私 承诺纯离线运行，所有转换任务均在手机本地完成，绝不上传任何用户数据。（注：网络与定位权限仅用于连接您的墨水屏设备）

【关于开发者】
这是一款由个人开发者通过 AI 辅助（Vibe Coding）完成的作品。由于设备精力有限，无法覆盖所有测试场景，如果您发现了奇奇怪怪的 Bug，请多多包涵。
非常感谢各位“云股东”的支持与厚爱，欢迎随时在评论区交流建议或吐槽！

使用条款 (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
